arguments.name: Connection
arguments.description: A text string of the name of the connection to the cube.

arguments.name: Member_expression
arguments.description: A text string of a multidimensional expression (MDX) that evaluates to a unique member in the cube. Alternatively, member_expression can be a tuple, specified as a cell range or an array constant.

arguments.name: Caption
arguments.description: A text string displayed in the cell instead of the caption, if one is defined, from the cube. When a tuple is returned, the caption used is the one for the last member in the tuple.
